Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class Application
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Application executes methods called at view level.
